panel.name: Add Visonic PowerMax panel
panel.explain: This application can connect to a Visonic PowerMax panel that communicates serial data via TCP/IP. Please specify the location of the panel in the network.

search.title: Searching for Visonic PowerMax on __addr__...
search.success: Found your Visonic PowerMax. Device will be added.
search.failed: Unable to locate the Visonic PowerMax on __addr__!

download.name: Enroll the panel in PowerLink mode & download settings
download.explain: In order for the application to be able to find all sensors and other information, the panel will need to operate in PowerLink mode. Newer panels (starting with the PowerMax Pro with partition support) enroll automatically. Older models require manual interaction to enroll. In case the enrollment procedure does not continue automatically, please consult the user manual on how to enroll. When the panel is enrolled, the settings will be downloaded.
download.download: Enrollment complete. Downloading panel information... Please wait...
download.complete: Download completed. The panel can now be added.

pair.add_panel: Please pair a panel first before adding something else.

contact.name: Add Visonic PowerMax door/window sensor
contact.title: Panel
contact.explain: Select the panel for which to add door/window sensors.

motion.name: Add Visonic PowerMax motion sensor
motion.title: Panel
motion.explain: Select the panel for which to add motion sensors.

smoke.name: Add Visonic PowerMax smoke detector
smoke.title: Panel
smoke.explain: Select the panel for which to add smoke detectors.

pgm.name: Add Visonic PowerMax programmable output (PGM)
pgm.title: Panel
pgm.explain: Select the panel for which to add the programmable output.

x10.name: Add Visonic PowerMax X10 device
x10.title: Panel
x10.explain: Select the panel for which to add X10 devices.

settings.no_pin: No pin code entered. Settings have not been saved.
settings.invalid_pin: Wrong pin code entered. Settings have not been saved.
settings.invalid_user: User __user__ does not exist. Settings have not been saved.

open.more: Panel __panel__ has the following __cnt__ zones open: __items__.

status.general: The status of panel __panel__ is currently __status__.
status.memory: there is an alarm in memory

trouble.none: There is no problem with __panel__ that I'm aware of.

sensor.more: These sensors of __panel__ have a __type__ problem: __sensor__

error.sensor_removed: The sensor is no longer enrolled.
